doc:
Arthur Tavares https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Tavares 0 Arthur Tavares (1884–1954) was an American actor and film editor. He was born as Arturo Tavares in San Francisco in 1884. During the 1910s Tavares appeared as an actor in silent films in Hollywood, but during the 1920s he switched to become an editor. At the beginning of the sound era, Tavares worked on Spanish language versions of American films. He also made a number of films in Britain, including The Wrecker, The First Born and Song of Freedom. Arthur_Tavares ( 1884 – 1954 ) was an_American_actor_and_film_editor . He was_born as Arturo_Tavares in San_Francisco in 1884 . During the_1910s_Tavares appeared as an_actor in silent_films in Hollywood , but during the_1920s he switched_to_become an_editor . At the_beginning of the_sound_era , Tavares worked on Spanish_language_versions of American_films . He also made a_number of films in Britain , including The_Wrecker , The_First_Born and Song of Freedom .
